summary: An ordinance relating to and amending Plat 52E, page 133, of the Official Zoning Map of the City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in T. Hanford's Additions, Lot 1-5, inclusive, Block 39, and portion of S.E. 1/4 Sec. 9-24N-4E beginning at N.W. corner of Lot 5, Block 39, then north 40', then east 100', then south 40', then west 100' to beginning, as General Commercial (CG) Zone.
